name: Spiscape
description:
EMERGENCY - Your mother needs to be rescued. Collect upgrades to battle the spider and save your mother.

Made for the Make-A-Level Jam with the theme:"Emergency".

Minimap-M/tab/shift  |  Move - arrow keys
Jump - Z   |  Shoot - X
Shoot bossbullet - C

Prefer a windows build? Download below.

Pixelart and code-magic by Jaël (@jael137)
Original music and edited SFX by Johnny (@SleepyUFO)
Any feedback is more than welcome.
